title: Flight Simulator 2020   How to   Airbus A320   MCDU Using airways and removing flight plan
description:
Based on several questions of a video posted a long time ago I decided to post another part which looks at how to use the MCDU in the Airbus A320 (default) for flight planning. In this video we are going to look specifically at two questions:

- how to delete a flight plan
- how to use airways in a flight plan

warning: due to a possible bug in MSFS the airways part is shown but might not work in your case.

00:00 intro
00:10 deleting the flight plan
03:12 using airways
